summary: This bill, the "Save Building Resilient Infrastructure and Communities Act" (Save BRIC Act), amends the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to mandate the President provide assistance for predisaster hazard mitigation measures. It highlights the benefits of mitigation in reducing life and property loss from disasters, citing the high cost of recent weather-related disasters. The bill references the cancellation of the Building Resilient Communities and Infrastructure (BRIC) program and aims to reinstate and strengthen predisaster mitigation efforts.
